snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored the deciding goal and added two assists as the Devils defeated the visiting Hurricanes to even their record at 1-1.
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored the deciding goal and added two assists as the Devils defeated the visiting Hurricanes to even their record at 1-1.

headline.main: Devils Get First Win With Help From Kovalchuk
headline.print_headline: Devils Get First Win With Help From Kovalchuk
headline.seo: Kovalchuk Lifts Devils Over Hurricanes and to Their First Win
